name: stockloyal-onboarding-robot
description: High-volume onboarding test automation for StockLoyal

scripts.robot:single: cross-env ROBOT_COUNT=1 ROBOT_API=https://api.stockloyal.com/api ROBOT_MERCHANT=merchant001 npx playwright test onboarding-robot.spec.js --headed --workers=1
scripts.robot:small: cross-env ROBOT_COUNT=10 ROBOT_API=https://api.stockloyal.com/api npx playwright test onboarding-robot.spec.js --workers=2
scripts.robot:medium: cross-env ROBOT_COUNT=100 ROBOT_API=https://api.stockloyal.com/api npx playwright test onboarding-robot.spec.js --workers=5
scripts.robot:large: cross-env ROBOT_COUNT=500 ROBOT_API=https://api.stockloyal.com/api npx playwright test onboarding-robot.spec.js --workers=8
scripts.robot:stress: cross-env ROBOT_COUNT=1000 ROBOT_API=https://api.stockloyal.com/api npx playwright test onboarding-robot.spec.js --workers=10
